> [{quoted}](name=CaramelxFrappe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YggAbwqz,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-12T20:40:01.351+0000)

> ... Also if you bring up the old Poppy I swear to god ....

There's a scene in Billy and Mandy where the bully kid holds up sticks and stones after Billy tries to stand up to the bully kid. If I wasn't on my phone, I would have tracked that scene down, photo shopped Poppy's old splashes onto them and added a subtitle "well?" Waiting for a response from you. But since it's 1am over here, I'll just post my response later. 

If anyone needs me, I'll be binge watching Steven Universe Season 4. 

Peace!

where is the signature?
